title: Can Miss Fortune get her hat back?
body:
I'm just saying if you're not going to change anything about her VO it's stupid to just leave her the way she is. She has a taunt that has her throw her hat in the air and grab it 

https://youtu.be/qwmGJ6qz_DQ?t=14

And Don't say it's not possible 

https://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/madoka/images/c/cf/Mami_magical_outfit_1.png/revision/latest?cb=20160821015047

https://media.giphy.com/media/nfHkqOyp52ErS/giphy.gif

I added that gif because I liked it LOL

replies.body: Secret Agent Miss Fortune doesn't have a hat either. So I'm ok with another skin for her not getting a hat.

Hey! 


SilverUnicorn, who is the character artist on Star Guardian Miss Fortune, [gave some context on PBE](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/hLZHn9UX-pbe-bugs-feedback-thread-star-guardian-miss-fortune?comment=0003) as to why she doesn't have a hat for this skin - 

*Hey! I can chime in on that! During the concept stage we tried a handful of hats and nothing really felt right for her and this SG line so we made the decision just to keep it light and gave her a hair pin instead :)*
This kind of classy hat would not fit to her spiky long hair. But... I don't know what kind of hat would fit to her SG skin...

> [{quoted}](name=Moonboy65,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=aetQnQJu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-09T14:18:12.350+0000)
>
> you talking about Star Guardian?

no dip lol
